info.title: Update Management
info.description: APIs for managing software update configurations.

get.description: Return list of software update configuration machine runs

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. You can use the following filters: 'properties/osType', 'properties/status', 'properties/startTime', and 'properties/softwareUpdateConfiguration/name'

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: number of entries you skip before returning results

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries returned in the results collection

200.description: Return list of software update configuration machine runs.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

get.description: Get a single software update configuration machine run by Id.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: softwareUpdateConfigurationMachineRunId
parameters.description: The Id of the software update configuration machine run.

200.description: A single software update configuration machine run.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

id.description: Id of the job associated with the software update configuration run

jobNavigation.description: Software update configuration machine run job navigation properties.

id.description: Resource Id of the software update configuration machine run

name.description: Name of the software update configuration machine run

softwareUpdateConfigurationMachineRun.description: Software update configuration machine run model.

nextLink.description: link to next page of results.

value.description: outer object returned when listing all software update configuration machine runs

softwareUpdateConfigurationMachineRunLis.description: result of listing all software update configuration machine runs

configuredDuration.description: configured duration for the software update configuration run.

correlationId.description: correlation id of the software update configuration machine run

createdBy.description: createdBy property, which only appears in the response.

creationTime.description: Creation time of the resource, which only appears in the response.

endTime.description: End time of the software update configuration machine run.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

error.description: Error response of an operation failure

lastModifiedBy.description: lastModifiedBy property, which only appears in the response.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last time resource was modified, which only appears in the response.

osType.description: Operating system target of the software update configuration triggered this run

sourceComputerId.description: source computer id of the software update configuration machine run

startTime.description: Start time of the software update configuration machine run.

status.description: Status of the software update configuration machine run.

updateConfigurationMachineRunProperties.description: Software update configuration machine run properties.

name.description: Name of the software update configuration triggered the software update configuration run

updateConfigurationNavigation.description: Software update configuration Run Navigation model.
